overview: Classic pornographer Christoph Clark combines two of his favorite subjects - gorgeous, glamorous, lingerie-clad women and explicit lesbian action - in his rudely titled new production "Suck My Cunt." The legendary director features a bevy of sensuous Hungarian starlets and other international beauties in six sizzling-hot scenes of girl-on-girl lust and Sapphic satiation.
title: Suck My Cunt
